name: ARE WE NOT THE SAME, YOU AND I?

system.description:
You gain an Overlord Stat, write it now. See page 180 of the Fellowship book for more information.

While your Overlord stat is undamaged, you are the same as the Overlord and cannot harm or hinder them. If they make you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.overlord-moves.Item.BOBrp1ZWbYp6AMDN]{an Offer You Can't Refuse} while your Overlord stat is undamaged, you must accept it, but your power is great enough that you may negotiate. You may add a caveat to their terms.

When you are exposed to the Overlord's Weakness, you immediately damage your Overlord stat.

When an Overlord stat is damaged, mark the box. Overlord stats are always true unless they are damaged.
